***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Classical_Newar 𑐡𑐾𑐱 (deśa), from Sanskrit देश (deśa), from Proto-Indo-
Aryan *dayśás, from Proto-Indo-Iranian *dayćás (“part, point; country”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [deɛː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
देय् • (deê) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐡𑐾𑐫𑑂)
   1. country
            भारत छगु दक्षिण एसियाली देय् ख।
                  bhārata chagu dakṣiṇa esiyālī deê kha.
                  India is a country in South Asia.
